category.name: Dispatcher
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: DISPATCHER_rqst_on_specific_dataset_revision
preference.preference_description: Specifies if the rich client "On-Demand Translation" command should be using the specific or the latest revision of the dataset. Valid Values: * true: The dispatcher request uses the specific revision of the dataset. * false: The dispatcher request uses the latest revision of the dataset. This is the default value.
